name: Technical Specialist
description:
MAIN RESPONSIBILITIES:

  • Work with huge amount of data, data analysis, data aggregation
  • Interaction and cooperation with NielsenIQ add-hoc analytical department: deep understanding of main projects results and ability to implement the main outcomes into particular categories overall analytics
  • Deep dive issue-based analytics of NielsenIQ Retail Measurement Data helping to answer internal clients business questions
  • Presentation of analysis results to internal and external clients
  • Understanding of macro-economic trends and their influence on retail and particular Food \ Non-Food categories dynamics.

REQUIREMENTS:

  • Strong technical & analytical skills, Python, SQL, perfect logical way of thinking
  • Open mind, wide knowledge and understanding of economy
  • Quickly perceives information, knows how to focus and very good in time management
  • Ready to change / develop
  • Deep knowledge of Excel (advanced level), Visual Basic knowledge
  • Ability to visualize a large amount of information
  • High level of presentation skills
  • English - from intermediate level

COMPENSATION:

  • Competitive salary
  • Medical insurance program
  • Team of professionals
  • Coffee-points and relax zones
  • Free-time clubs (Book Club, Travel Club, Music Club)
  • PrimeZone Corporate Benefits Program
  • Corporate English language lessons
  • Social and corporate events
  • Sports activities
  • Office near Metro station (5 minutes walk)

ABOUT NielsenIQ

We are the most trusted source for complete consumer intelligence as we have for nearly 100 years. Our ability to provide global retailers, manufacturers and partners with the most comprehensive data, analysis and insights will remain unmatched.

We deliver the complete truth. That’s why we are unrelenting in our pursuit of the most comprehensive data sets, measuring all transactions equally to deliver the knowledge people need. Our best-in-class data scientists and analysts simplify the complexity of this information, illuminating powerful insights through clear, compelling stories. We capture the world as it truly is to enable leaders to look forward and empower businesses to make decisions with confidence.

Check our current job openings now to begin your NielsenIQ journey.
